    • 方法详细资料

      • allocate

        public void allocate(int capacity)
        Allocate a direct or heap buffer
        参数:
        capacity - the capacity of the buffer

      • allocateByteBuffer

        protected abstract java.nio.ByteBuffer allocateByteBuffer(int capacity,
                                                          boolean direct)
        allocate a ByteBuffer
        参数:
        capacity - the capacity of the buffer
        direct - direct or heap buffer
        返回:
        allocated ByteBuffer instance

      • wrap

        protected abstract void wrap(java.nio.ByteBuffer buf)
        wrap a ByteBuffer into IoBuffer instance
        参数:
        buf - the ByteBuffer

      • available

        public boolean available()
        返回:
        if the IoBuffer can be used

      • remaining

        public final int remaining()
        返回:
        The remaining bytes in the buffer
        另请参阅:
        Buffer.remaining()

      • hasRemaining

        public final boolean hasRemaining()
        返回:
        true if there are some remaining bytes in the buffer
        另请参阅:
        Buffer.hasRemaining()

      • flip

        public final void flip()

      • free

        public void free()
        Declares this buffer and all its derived buffers are not used anymore It is not mandatory to call this method, but you might want to invoke this method for maximum performance.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        另请参阅:
        Buffer.flip()

      • buf

        public abstract java.nio.ByteBuffer buf()
        返回:
        the underlying ByteBuffer instance.

      • limit

        public int limit()
        返回:
        the modified IoBuffer 's limit
        另请参阅:
        Buffer.limit()

      • limit

        public void limit(int newLimit)
        参数:
        newLimit - The new buffer's limit
        另请参阅:
        Buffer.limit(int)

      • position

        public int position()
        返回:
        The current position in the buffer
        另请参阅:
        Buffer.position()

      • capacity

        public int capacity()
        返回:
        the buffer capacity
        另请参阅:
        Buffer.capacity()

      • position

        public void position(int newPosition)
        参数:
        newPosition - Sets the new position in the buffer
        另请参阅:
        Buffer.position(int)

      • indexOf

        public abstract int indexOf(byte b)
        Returns the first occurrence position of the specified byte from the current position to the current limit.
        参数:
        b - The byte we are looking for
        返回:
        -1 if the specified byte is not found

      • get

        public abstract byte get()
        返回:
        The byte at the current position
        另请参阅:
        ByteBuffer.get()

      • get

        public abstract byte get(int index)
        参数:
        index - The position for which we want to read a byte
        返回:
        the byte at the given position
        另请参阅:
        ByteBuffer.get(int)

      • getString

        public abstract java.lang.String getString(java.nio.charset.CharsetDecoder decoder)
                                    throws java.nio.charset.CharacterCodingException
        Read a string from this buffer using the specified decoder and returns it. This method reads until the limit of this buffer if no NUL is found.
        参数:
        decoder - The CharsetDecoder to use
        返回:
        the read String
        抛出:
        java.nio.charset.CharacterCodingException - Thrown when an error occurred while decoding the buffer

      • putString

        public abstract void putString(java.lang.CharSequence val,
                               java.nio.charset.CharsetEncoder encoder)
                        throws java.nio.charset.CharacterCodingException
        Writes the content of specified CharSequence into this buffer using the specified encoder.
        参数:
        val - The CharSequence to put in the IoBuffer
        encoder - The CharsetEncoder to use
        抛出:
        java.nio.charset.CharacterCodingException - When we have an error while decoding the String

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 java.lang.Object
